subject: Problem with Order EE-45551
description:
Dear Customer Service,
Thank you in advance in helping to resolve our concern. We love the quality and design of this desk, but one of the pieces (the right return) does not match the rest of the desk. It is possibly from a different stain lot. It is more orange and also has a completely different sheen  Please see the attached pictures and let me know what the next step will be to get a replacement ‘right return’ for the desk.

Thanks, 
Susan Timmer
616-414-2561
